siteMetadata.name: Ivan Novikov
siteMetadata.title: Ivan Novikov
siteMetadata.about: I like coding, but what I like even more is figuring out ways to achieve the same ends with less code and less complexity. I've had an opportunity to practice this type of thinking as a solopreneur, and I'm looking at freelance and startup work as a way to keep practicing it, but at the same time grow professionally through interaction with new colleagues and new technologies. Feel free to reach out: Twitter DMs are open, and my email is on my GitHub profile.
siteMetadata.author: @ivan7237d
